name: Non-Farm Payrolls (NFP)
description: Monthly report on the number of jobs added or lost in the US economy.

name: Gross Domestic Product (GDP)
description: Quarterly report on the total value of goods and services produced in the US economy.

name: Average Hourly Earnings m/m
description: Monthly report on the change in the average hourly earnings of employees, indicating wage inflation.

name: Unemployment Rate
description: Monthly report on the percentage of the total workforce that is unemployed and actively seeking work.

name: Consumer Price Index (CPI)
description: Monthly report on the change in prices of goods and services purchased by consumers.

name: Producer Price Index (PPI)
description: Monthly report on the change in prices received by domestic producers for their goods and services.

name: Federal Reserve Interest Rate Decisions
description: The Federal Reserve's decisions on interest rates which can affect borrowing costs and inflation.

name: Retail Sales
description: Monthly report on the total amount of sales at retail establishments.

name: ISM Services PMI
description: A monthly survey of purchasing managers in the services sector, providing insights into economic conditions.

name: ISM Manufacturing Index
description: Monthly report on the level of activity in the manufacturing sector.

name: Core Retail Sales m/m
description: Monthly report on the change in the total value of sales at the retail level, excluding automobiles.

name: Flash Manufacturing PMI
description: Monthly survey of purchasing managers in the manufacturing sector to gauge business conditions.

name: Flash Services PMI
description: Monthly survey of purchasing managers in the services sector to gauge business conditions.

name: Housing Starts
description: Monthly report on the number of new residential construction projects started.

name: Durable Goods Orders
description: Monthly report on the total value of new orders for long-lasting goods.

name: Core Durable Goods Orders m/m
description: Measures the change in the total value of new orders for US manufactured durable goods, excluding transportation items.

name: Employment Cost Index q/q
description: Measures the quarterly change in the price businesses and the government pay for labor, including wages and benefits.

name: Consumer Confidence
description: Monthly report on the level of confidence consumers have in the economy.

name: Prelim UoM Consumer Sentiment
description: Early estimate of the state of consumer confidence in the US.

name: Revised UoM Consumer Sentiment
description: Updated and final measure of consumer confidence in the US, following the preliminary estimate.

name: ADP Non-Farm Employment Change
description: Monthly report that provides an early estimate of employment changes in the non-farm private sector.

name: Initial Jobless Claims
description: Weekly report on the number of individuals who have filed for unemployment insurance for the first time.

name: JOLTS Job Openings
description: Monthly report on the number of job openings during the reported month, excluding the farming industry.

name: Goods Trade Balance
description: Monthly report on the difference in value between imported and exported goods.

name: Personal Income m/m
description: Monthly change in the total income earned by individuals.

name: Personal Spending m/m
description: Monthly change in consumption expenditures by individuals.

name: Revised UoM Inflation Expectations
description: Updated inflation expectations based on consumer sentiment data.

name: RCM/TIPP Economic Optimism
description: Index derived from a national survey that gauges the economic sentiment and optimism of consumers.

name: Beige Book
description: Provides qualitative information on current economic conditions across 12 Federal Reserve Districts.

name: Chicago PMI
description: Measures the level of a diffusion index based on surveyed purchasing managers in Chicago.

name: Philly Fed Manufacturing Index
description: Surveys manufacturers in the Philadelphia Federal Reserve district to gauge business conditions.

name: Challenger Job Cuts y/y
description: Measures the change in the number of job cuts announced by employers compared to the same month the previous year.

name: Trade Balance
description: Monthly report on the difference between a country's exports and imports.

name: New Home Sales
description: Monthly report on the number of new homes sold.

name: Existing Home Sales
description: Monthly report on the number of existing homes sold.

name: Pending Home Sales
description: Measures the change in the number of homes under contract to be sold but still awaiting the closing transaction.

name: Empire State Manufacturing Index
description: Monthly report on business activity in the New York region.

name: Richmond Manufacturing Index
description: Measures the level of manufacturing activity in the Richmond Federal Reserve district.

name: S&P/CS Composite-20 HPI y/y
description: Year-over-year change in the value of residential real estate in 20 metropolitan regions of the US.

name: HPI m/m
description: Monthly change in the purchase price of houses with mortgages backed by Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac.

name: NAHB Housing Market Index
description: Assesses the sentiment of homebuilders and is a leading indicator for the housing sector.

name: Wholesale Inventories
description: Monthly report on the level of inventories held by wholesalers.

name: Industrial Production and Capacity Utilization
description: Monthly report on the level of output and capacity utilization in the US industrial sector.

name: Crude Oil Inventories
description: Weekly report on the change in the number of barrels of crude oil held in inventory by commercial firms.

name: Natural Gas Storage
description: Weekly report detailing the changes in the amount of natural gas held in storage.

name: Capacity Utilization Rate
description: Measures the rate at which potential output levels are being met or used.

name: Chicago Purchasing Managers Index (PMI)
description: Monthly report on business activity in the Chicago region.
